author: Werd Web Dev

cards.name: Repulsor Blast
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to an enemy within 6 squares; look at the top 3 cards of your deck, keep 1, then cleanse one negative condition from yourself.

cards.name: Energy Shield
cards.rulesText: Gain a 6-point Shield and a Fortified token; draw 1 card.

cards.name: Micro-Missiles
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to up to two enemies; push each target 1 square.

cards.name: Homing Rockets
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to every enemy in a 3-hex burst; draw 1 card.

cards.name: Laser Lariat
cards.rulesText: Pull a target 3 squares toward you, then deal 3 damage to it.

cards.name: Smart Targeting
cards.rulesText: Look at the top 5 cards of any deck, reorder them, then your opponent discards 1 random card.

cards.name: Predictive Algorithms
cards.rulesText: Play when attacked: cancel the attack; the attacker is Stunned.

cards.name: Strategic Uplink
cards.rulesText: Gain 1 additional action this turn and a Hasted token.

cards.name: Emergency Protocols
cards.rulesText: Heal yourself or an ally 4 HP and remove Stunned, Immobilized, or Bleeding from that character.

cards.name: Auto-Target Barrage
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to up to two enemies; look at the top 3 cards of your deck, keep 1.

cards.name: Adaptive Battle Plan
cards.rulesText: Swap places with an ally within 4 squares; that ally gains Empowered.

cards.name: Predictive Evasion
cards.rulesText: Teleport up to 5 squares; you are Phase-Shifted until your next turn.

cards.name: House Party Protocol
cards.rulesText: Summon two 3-HP Iron Legion drone minions adjacent to you; they act immediately after you this turn.

cards.name: Emergency Gauntlet
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy; gain a Focused token.
